amazons.logic package¶

Submodules¶

amazons.logic.amazons_logic module¶

class amazons.logic.amazons_logic.Board(*args)¶

Bases: object

Class that represents the board (and state) of the game and also presents methods to get, do, undo and validate moves

Board data:

1=white, -1=black, 0=empty, 2=blocked

move = (amazon, place, shoot) where:

amazon: the piece that will be moved place: the tile where the piece will be moved shoot: the tile that will be shot by the amazon

Attributes:

n: dimension of the board board: matrix representing the board black_positions: positions of black pieces white_positions: positions of white pieces

Author: Gonzalo Rodríguez Rodríguez

execute_move(move, player)¶

Executes a full move on the board

A move has the following elements: amazon: the piece that will be moved place: the tile where the piece will be moved shoot: the tile that will be shot by the amazon :param move: move to be executed :param player: player to move :return: None

get_legal_moves(player)¶

Get all the legal moves for a player (-1 is black, 1 is white) :param player: int :return: all legal full moves

get_moves_amazon(amazon, player)¶

Get the full moves for a certain amazon :param amazon: (int, int) :param player: int :return: full game of the amazons move for a player

get_moves_position(position)¶

Get the queen-like moves from a certain position :param position: (int, int) :return: amazon queen-like moves from the position

has_legal_moves(player)¶

Returns True is the specified player has legal moves and False otherwise :param player: int :return: bool

is_valid_move(move, player)¶

Returns True if the specified move is valid and False otherwise :param move: move to be verified :param player: player that makes the move :return: bool

is_win(player)¶

Returns True if the player has won, False otherwise :param player: int :return: bool

move_piece(amazon, place, player)¶

Moves a piece from one tile to another (note that this is not a full move, just a piece move without the shot) :param amazon: amazon to move :param place: square to move the amazon to :param player: player that moves the amazon :return: None

print_board()¶

Prints the board xd :return: None

shoot_arrow(shoot)¶

Blocks a tile from the board, that is the shooting part of a full move :param shoot: square to shoot :return: None

undo_move(move, player)¶

Undoes a move, that is, leaves the board as if the move was never made :param move: move to undo :param player: player that made the move :return: None
